Name: La Favola
Review Text: Great Italian restaurant which is run by mother and her son. The food is of great quality. Be sure to make a reservation because you'll be waiting for a long time if you don't. It takes a bit if time before the food came out but the kitchen …

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Exquisite Italian food made by an Italian mom in the kitchen, son serves and when it's quiet plays the piano. He's really good too! No pizza at this place, but that's not a problem at all. Affordable too.

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Really unimpressed, in fact, quite disgusted with this restaurant. We came upon it by walking past it during the day and fancied Italian for the evening. Not sure what it was going to be like but thought we would give it a go. It was busy …

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Am here now, good food but very bad service. The sides came half way through the main, we our drinks were empty but we were not asked if we want another drink. There are just 4 full tables and the staff are too busy chatting away with customer friends than serving . I would give 4 stars for the food but 0 for service.

Name: La Favola
Review Text: By far the best Italian restaurant in Amsterdam. Feels like coming home - Benni is the best host. Good food, amazing housewine (primitivo) and the tortelloni is without a doubt the best - simply delicious.

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Great food at a very reasonable price. Welcoming staff and quick serving. Will be back if coming to Amsterdam again!

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Very warm staff and a great and cozy location. Also excellent food and great wine all at a reasonable price.

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Excellent Italian food and extremely friendly service. The restaurant is very cosy and intimate.

Name: La Favola
Review Text:
Super friendly and professional service; Romantic, intimate and Cozy. Yummy food.
We will be back !

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Interesting and friendly staff and wonderful food.  I'll be going back

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Exceptional food and wonderful atmosphere.

Name: La Favola
Review Text: Great place, great attention, great service... La cuocca e bravissima
